mapper.sql: select idalarm, member_caller, member_receiver, post_id, like_id, follow_id, is_read, access from coco.alarm

insert into coco.alarm (member_caller,member_receiver, post_id, like_id, follow_id, is_read, access)
values(#{memberCaller},#{memberReceiver}, #{postId},#{likeId},#{followId},#{isRead},#{access})

update alarm set member_caller=#{memberCaller}, member_receiver=#{memberReceiver}, post_id=#{postId}, like_id=#{likeId}, follow_id=#{followId}, is_read=#{isRead}, access=#{access} where idalarm=#{idalarm}

select.where:
access = access
AND idalarm = '${idalarm}'
AND member_caller = '${memberCaller}'
AND member_receiver = '${memberReceiver}'
AND post_id = '${postId}'
AND like_id = '${likeId}'
AND follow_id = '${followId}'
AND is_read = '${isRead}'
